actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to decontrol the wellhead price of natural gas produced from certain tight formations.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Policy of 1978 to decontrol the wellhead price of natural gas which is produced from a new well a mile or more from the nearest marker well and which is from a specified formation or is new tight formation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to decontrol the wellhead price of natural gas produced from certain tight formations.
